_sText:
Level -- Box with a Light in it (Spawn)
=======================================
- 25 second level to prepare for the random teleporter and mother zombie spawn
- Transitional area between levels to repurchase gear

Level -- Open Field
===================
- Group up or run solo to survive the Slender Forest until teleported to next level 

Level--Classic
==============
- Hold off the zombie in a classic Zombie Mod office until teleported to next level

Level -- Fail Nade
==================
- Split up and hold both sides of the sewer until the zombie drain valves open to flush them away

Level -- Carpet Escape
======================
- Run or take a magic carpet ride to escape the infected palace

Level -- IceCap Escape
======================
- Listen well as you revisit the frozen wasteland and its abandon facility to escape in style

Level -- City Night Escape
==========================
- Careful not to fall as you escape the skyscraper by taking an elevator ride to the helicopter rescue zone

Level -- Zombie Death Run
=========================
- Survive the zombie traps and escape the temple before its curse gets reaches you

Level -- Couch Escape
=====================
- Escape by guiding a couch to the exit tunnel by breaking the couch weak barricades

Level -- Interstellar Escape 9
==============================
- Escape the black hole along the interstellar railroad moving from train to train until you reach the Final Express 

Level -- Zombie Murder (Boss)
=============================
- Defend the sign until the boss comes to challenge you with its barrel attacks and 4 zombie guarded life support computers

Version 9 Fix
=============================
- 2 Interstellar glitches fixed
- 2 City Night glitches fixed
- Couch crouch spot under crate fixed
- Fail Nade valves can now be activated from CT damage
- Boss base heath increased and life support button order now random
- Few minor balance changes

Version 9 Fix 2
=============================
- Zombie spawn timer error fixed
- Final Boss button glitches fixed
- Few more minor balance changes

Version 10
=======================================
- Bug/Glitch fixed for multiple maps
- Few level design changes
- Few more minor balance changes
- Additional secrets/items

Version 10 fix ( Final version hopefully D: )
=======================================
- Fixed remaining level/music glitches 



Side note (screenshots on steam)
=============================
Sorry, for the delays, but unfortunately this file and some data had been lost for some time along with some other matters, however, during that time I spent most of it on a complete remake of this map which is almost ready for testing. It will (hopefully) include 3 (1 complete) additional levels and it may or may not replace this version, should all goes well.
